column2:
As a web designer, I worked on various projects involving website redesign and UX/UI design. One project included redesigning the Children's Music School website to create a visually appealing and easy-to-navigate landing page. I conducted a thorough analysis of the existing site, created a detailed wireframe, and focused on color scheme and typography consistent with the school's brand. I ensured the page was user-friendly, accessible, and responsive on all devices.

Additionally, I worked on the Pet-Saver-Hub project, focusing on creating a user-friendly interface for users to search for lost or found pets. Through user research, I identified key pain points and developed a user flow and wireframe with interactive elements like a map feature for easier pet finding.

My experience has equipped me with skills in wireframing, visual design, user research, and responsive design. I am eager to grow in UI/UX design, collaborate with professionals, undertake challenging projects to unleash my creative potential, and stay updated on design technologies and trends. I value communication, teamwork, interact with users for feedback, and prioritize creativity and attention to detail for high-quality work.

column2:
• Over 12 years of experience in design with a focus on UI/UX & brand design.
• Successfully completed more than 300 projects, including 30 products from scratch, 30 mobile applications, 80 websites, and 100 logos and corporate styles.
• Founded and managed own design studio with a team of 20 employees, overseeing sales, management, hiring, and project creation processes.
• Taught UI/UX & brand design to over 150 students.
• Presented at conferences such as Dribble.
• Holds a Master's degree in “Engineering Design” and is currently studying for an MBA.
• Proficient in frontend technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, TypeScript, and Vue.js, as well as backend technologies like Python and Swift.
• Experience working in industries such as eCommerce, finance, banking, investments, marketing, social media, laws, education, development, NFT, art, auto, game design, construction, agriculture, food, coffee, fashion, beauty, service, music, dance, MMA, medicine, space, sports, technology, weapons, and insurance.
• Worked with clients from the USA, United Kingdom, Germany, Netherlands, Italy, France, Greece, Estonia, Australia, China, and Ukraine.
• Previous positions include roles as a UX Designer at Bank BVR, UI/UX Design Teacher at Hillel IT School, Lead Product Designer at Innovation Box, UI/UX & Brand Designer at Ardas, M2E pro, Forforce, Art. Lebedev Studio, as well as CEO & Designer at Own Design Studio.

column2:
Digital Designer with 6+ years of experience specializing in UI design team management. Skilled in developing user-friendly websites with strong visual and brand storytelling. Proven track record of creating e-commerce, services, and corporate websites with user-centric solutions.

Skills:
- Strong understanding of user experience
- Cross-functional experience working with developers
- Exceptional problem-solving skills
- Attention to detail and dedication to proper delivery
- Collaborative mindset and interest in working with brand and marketing teams

Tools:
- Adobe (Photoshop, Illustrator, Invision, After Effect)
- Sketch
- Maxcon C4D
- Figma

EXPERIENCE

Art Director, UI Senior Designer | Freelance 
February 2019 - Present

UI Team Lead, UI Senior Designer | Intetics Inc.
June 2018 - January 2019
- Led and managed a UI team
- Oversaw all web design projects from start to finish
- Provided feedback and guidance to UX and UI designers
- Worked with developers and QA to implement designs accurately
- Designed wireframes, workflows, prototypes, sketches, and high-fidelity mockups
- Presented and defended designs to stakeholders 

Art Director, UI Senior Designer | Vintage Web Production
February 2015 — May 2018
- Developed and executed concepts
- Created designs to evoke a "WOW" emotion
- Provided initial designs and worked with developers for final project delivery
- Mentored and motivated team members
- Presented creative ideas to clients

UI Web Designer | Indigo Web Development
October 2014 - February 2015
- Executed design concepts
- Assisted in long-term projects
- Worked on services and eCommerce websites

column2:
Worked as Graphic Designer/Lead Graphic Designer and Prepress Operator/DTP Designer.

Expert in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Good in Adobe InDesign and Figma. Some skill in Blender and After Effects.

Last three jobs:
1. Graphic designer & UI/UX designer at QA Madness
nov 2022 - now
- Played a key role in the company's global redesign, making a significant impact on the final result.
- Redesigned website to align with new vision and style.
- Successfully implemented a fresh visual style for presentations.
- Revamped all SMM materials for LinkedIn and Instagram, and created a page for DOU.
Main achievement: integrated 3D designs into my work.

2. Graphic Designer at Kronas
aug 2020 - feb 2022
- Designed logos, identities, and printing materials for new brands.
- Developed 3-6 advertising key visuals monthly for various platforms.
- Implemented a new visual style for the Instagram profile.
- Created multi-page catalogs and brochures using InDesign.
- Updated the company's YouTube channel design.
Main achievements:
• Designed and launched a sticker pack for Telegram and Viber.
• Led the design of a new trade hall, including branding stands and navigation.

3. Graphic Designer at Design Studio ToTop
oct 2019 - aug 2020
- Created designs for companies across different industries.
- Designed logos, identities, and outdoor advertising.
- Produced realistic product visualizations in Photoshop.
- Produced various printing materials such as calendars, business cards, and postcards.
- Developed multi-page catalogs and brochures.
Main achievement: designed and launched a 16-page brochure within a single working day after client approval.

I am a graphic designer currently pursuing my education at Kharkiv National University of Radio Electronics, specializing in Publishing and Printing at the Department of Media Systems and Technologies. I have also taken courses from Genius.Space in "Web Design" and "UX/UI Design". 

Attention to detail and the ability to structure information help me to create clear action plans, which is an important aspect of being a UX designer. Continuous learning and practice develop my skills related to visualization and graphic elements (UI).

Soft skills: teamwork, empathy, enjoyment of work, punctuality and discipline.

Graphic editors: figma, adobe illustrator, adobe photoshop, blender, autoCAD.

I have experience in commercial projects, including creating a set of business cards for a tattoo artist who is currently working abroad. Additionally, I have worked on various projects including website designs, brochures, presentations, and logos.

column2:
My design journey began 10 years ago at the College of Arts. I have had the opportunity to work with various clients from Europe and the USA, including an enterprise with over 250,000 employees and projects in e-Commerce and SaaS.

I am well-versed in the lifecycle of IT products, development processes, and methodologies. I have experience leading creative teams, communicating directly with clients, eliciting requirements, providing design solutions, and defending and iterating on them.

Key Skills:
- Team Leadership
- Project Management
- Project Estimation
- Resource Planning
- Presentation to Clients
- Client Communication
- Business English
- Enterprise Size Companies
- Agile and Scrum
- Art Direction
- Prototyping
- UI/UX Design
- Information Architecture
- UML Diagrams
- User Testing
- Mobile App Development
- SaaS
- Web Design
- Graphic Design

I am seeking a company that offers challenging projects, a laid-back atmosphere, a flexible schedule focused on results. I excel at communicating with clients, leading design teams, and managing projects, particularly in mobile and complex web solutions. In return, I provide top-notch output that prioritizes both business and user needs.

July 2021 – Present day

• Web content development
• Creation of logos, posters, graphics for events
• Infographics
• Development of landing pages
• Work with small architectural forms for advertising campaigns of events
• Design of presentations and training materials
• Creation of vector illustrations and mascots

July 2020 – July 2021

• Produced 500+ designs for social media
• Created 250+ designs for TV
• Conducted constant UI/UX designs for 2 products for over a year
• Ensured quality control of animators' work through designer review process
• Storyboarding and creating illustrations for showreels and promos

Technical Graphic Designer (Polygraphy) 
April 2019 – July 2020

• Developed designs based on customer requirements and prepared for printing
• Designed special layouts for printing on T-shirts and sweatshirts

• Developed technological maps

• Searched for tenders in company's areas of activities

column2:
Dynamic junior UI/UX designer with a strong foundation in design principles and user-centered methodologies. Completed a 6-month UI/UX design course and additional studies in HTML/CSS. Proficient in design software including Figma, Photoshop, and Illustrator. Skilled in producing interactive prototypes, wireframes, and mockups to enhance user engagement and product usability. Collaborative team player dedicated to continuous learning and adapting design strategies to meet evolving user needs.

Experience:
- Real estate site redesign: Conducted research and analysis of competitors to create a modern and user-friendly design for a real estate company in Destin, Florida. Developed 3 user personas and a customer journey map to improve customer experience. 
- Web service for booking excursions: Designed and developed a web service for users to find and book tours and excursions around the world. Analyzed market competitors, created task lists, customer journey maps, wireframes, and UI kits to ensure a seamless user experience. 

Skills:
- UI/UX design
- Prototyping
- Wireframing
- User research
- Design software (Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator)
- Collaboration
- Adaptive design

Seeking a full-time position in a product company focused on creating digital products for everyday life and business. Quick learner, responsible, and capable of performing complex tasks.

Seeking UX/UI design roles that align with passion for creating user-centered digital experiences, emphasizing creativity and collaboration within cross-functional teams. Not interested in roles focused on routine maintenance tasks without opportunities for design innovation. Looking for positions that allow for thorough user research, thoughtful ideation, and testing, prioritizing quality over speed and user satisfaction.

column2:
During my training, I completed three projects, two independently and one as part of a team. I am skilled at working both collaboratively and individually, with experience leading and generating ideas in team settings. Throughout my training, I gained valuable technical knowledge and theoretical insights.

Flowers delivery mobile app
- Developed a user-friendly and intuitive interface for an online flowers ordering service
- Conducted persona research to understand customer demand
- Created an easy-to-use app for customers to order bouquets from any location

Pet Scout. Animal pet search web service
- Conducted UX research and competitor analysis
- Worked on user flow and web service architecture
- Applied design principles to enhance user experience
- Collaborated with a team to create wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and Behance projects

Barbershop Landingpage
- Developed a landing page showcasing barbershop services and enabling appointment bookings
- Conducted competitor analysis and persona development
- Created desktop, tablet, and mobile versions of the site

Tattoo Studio Website Redesign
- Designed a website for a tattoo studio offering artist portfolios and consultation bookings
- Analyzed competitor data by age, sex, and other demographics
- Utilized insights to create a visually appealing and user-friendly website

I am seeking remote opportunities in a company or freelance capacity to further my growth as a designer. I value mentorship and aim to contribute to creating products that meet customer needs.

column2:
I have achieved several notable accomplishments during my training and projects. Despite my limited experience, I have actively pursued opportunities to showcase my skills and demonstrate my dedication to the field of UI/UX design.

1. Successful Completion of UI/UX Design Courses: I successfully completed comprehensive UI/UX design courses, gaining a solid foundation in design principles, user research methodologies, wireframing, prototyping, and interaction design.

2. Project Contributions: I actively participated in various design projects during my courses, collaborating with fellow designers, developers, and stakeholders to deliver well-designed user interfaces and engaging user experiences.

3. Positive Feedback from Instructors and Peers: Throughout my training, I received positive feedback on my design work, commending my attention to detail, creativity, and ability to incorporate user feedback into design iterations.

4. Continuous Learning and Growth: Despite being at the early stages of my career, I have demonstrated a strong commitment to continuous learning, engaging with design communities and staying up-to-date with industry trends to evolve as a UI/UX Designer.

Freelance UI/UX Designer (6 months): Developed and created unique user interfaces for various clients, analyzing client requirements, conducting user research, creating information architecture, conducting user experience testing, and creating prototypes. Participated in iterative processes and collaborated with developers to ensure high-quality end products.

During this time, I honed my skills in design and user experience, deepened my understanding of the product creation process, and improved my communication and project management skills. Clients received distinctive designs that enhanced user experience and improved conversion rates.

Looking to apply my independent work experience, organizational skills, and ability to meet deadlines to a new team, contributing to their goals and adding long-term value.

1. User-Centric Approach: I prioritize understanding user needs and expectations to provide a positive user experience.
2. Opportunities for Professional Growth: Seeking a company that offers development opportunities to stay current in UI/UX design practices.
3. Collaboration and Communication: Skilled at working with a team and communicating effectively with stakeholders to deliver high-quality design solutions.

column2:
During my continuous studies, I performed several impactful projects including: 
- Redesigned the website of a roofing materials plant from outdated and non-functional to a modern, convenient landing page with a unique structure
- Created a striking landing page for a tea studio focusing on aesthetics and cultural satisfaction for potential clients
- Developed an online store for board games incorporating elements of AI 
- Improved the Ukrainian cinema network Multiplex application through detailed UX research and proposed solutions to enhance user experience

Over the past eleven months, I have focused on advancing my skills in Ui/Ux design. I have mastered Figma, including components, variants, auto layout, and constraints, as the main tool for web design. Additionally, I proficiently use Photoshop and Illustrator in my work and have experience with Webflow and After Effects for web design and motion graphics.

I am dedicated to continuous development in the field of web design and consistently strive to enhance my skills. As a Ukrainian designer, I bring my unique creativity and style to each project, adding a touch of my Ukrainian identity to create original and impactful designs.

column2:
Objective: 
Seeking a position as a Web Designer where I can utilize my skills and experience to create intuitive and aesthetically pleasing web designs that provide a great user experience.

Skills:
- Developing effective interfaces
- Deep understanding of UX/UI
- Proficient in design tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, and Sketch
- Responsive design techniques
- Colour harmony and typography selection
- Prototyping and testing
- Ability to collaborate effectively

Experience:
Gifts&Fleurs:
- Conducted competitor analysis, identified user interests, and defined target audience needs
- Developed layouts for app features including onboarding, home page, catalogue, favourites, cart, and user profile
- Chose soothing pastel colour palette and legible font for optimal user experience

Mr.Cleaner:
- Collaborated with team to develop user-friendly design for a cleaning company
- Conducted competitor research, selected references, and analyzed target audience
- Created user flow diagram and designed main page layout
- Adapted design for different devices to ensure user-friendliness and modern aesthetic

A Kids Place Childcare:
- Redesigned website for a kindergarten, creating wireframes and UI design
- Developed clickable CTA and UI Kit for consistent design elements
- Adapted site for tablets and mobile devices to enhance user experience
- Used bright, playful colours to embody joy and positivity in the design, ensuring easy navigation for visitors

Education:
- Completed web design course mastering principles of designing effective interfaces
- Studied theory and practice of UX/UI design to create intuitive web designs
- Familiar with web design tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, and Sketch
- Implemented responsive design techniques for optimal display on various devices and screen sizes

Experienced UI/UX designer with a portfolio of 4 completed projects, showcasing both individual and teamwork abilities. Skilled in competitor analysis, wireframing, design, UI-kit creation, and prototyping. Strong communication skills demonstrated through active participation in project completion. Projects include:

1) Matcha Tea Website: Created an engaging and simplistic website through various stages of development.
2) HealthyLife Web Service (team project): Designed a user-friendly platform connecting users with quality healthcare providers.
3) FloverLover Landing Page: Developed a customer acquisition platform for a flower delivery service, including catalog, pricing, and reviews.
4) Tattoo Studio Landing Page: Designed a modern and visually appealing website for a tattoo studio, capturing the essence of the brand.

Seeking opportunities to continue creating innovative and user-centric designs, while providing valuable insights into competitor analysis and target audience research. Thank you for considering my profile.

I am interested in developing myself in the role of a UI/UX designer and am seeking opportunities for professional skill development, working in a project team, creative self-expression, support and mentorship, and career growth opportunities in this field.

Oksana

Junior UI/UX Designer

Successfully completed 6-month courses at Go-IT company with practical knowledge in UI/UX design, Web, and Mobile design. Specializes in UI/UX design for web and mobile applications. Responsible for designing user-friendly sites with clear navigation, intuitive interfaces, selecting fonts, backgrounds, icons, logos, animations, and banners. Analyzes user behavior to improve existing sites and create new projects.

Projects:
- Kindergarten website redesign: Redesigned outdated site to attract young parents and meet preschool education needs by conducting competitor research and implementing successful solutions.
- HOME for GUEST app: Designed a user-friendly website for a web service that allows users to change their environment by working or staying in a new place, similar to couch-surfing.

Seeking a company for professional growth and development.

Experience:

Junior UI/UX Designer at GoIT (start your career in IT) - 6 months
- Responsible for prototyping, web design, and applying UI/UX principles
- Proficient in Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, ProtoPie, and Canva
- Experience in creating wireframes, prototypes, and design systems
- Skilled in information architecture and understanding of UX principles
- Conducted UX research to improve user experiences

Skills:
Hard skills:
- Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, ProtoPie, Canva
- Wireframes, prototypes
- Understanding of UX principles
- Design Systems, UI-Kit 
- Information architecture

Soft skills:
- Curiosity
- Empathy
- Creative
- Attentive to details
- Critical thinking
- Communication skills

Project: 
ApartEase - a rental apartment web service
- Designed an adaptive UI kit for the platform
- Conducted analysis and created user flows for optimal user experience
- Developed minimum viable product (MVP) and customer journey maps (CJM)
- Created wireframes using Adobe Photoshop and Figma to visualize designs

Goal:
Seeking a position in a progressive company to collaborate on creating innovative and impactful products that resonate with users and exceed market standards.

column2:
Hello, I am a Junior UI/UX designer with a passion for creating effective and high-quality user experiences. My recent completion of courses in UI/UX design has equipped me with the basics of interface design, color theory, typography, and other essential skills in the field. I am inspired by new technologies and industry trends, and I am dedicated to continuous learning and growth in UI/UX design.

Project Experience:
- Redesign of an Indian restaurant website: Led the full cycle design process to create a mobile-friendly website with improved usability, resulting in increased customer acquisition.
- Turnabout Travel Booking Web-Service: Collaborated with a team to conduct competitor analysis, create personas, develop wireframes, and design a platform for renting housing.
- Rest Book Mobile Application: Worked in a team to conduct competitor analysis, create personas, and design a mobile application for booking tables in a restaurant.

I am a creative individual who enjoys designing websites and mobile applications, and I am currently focusing on UI/UX design to further develop my skills. I have experience creating a landing page for a barbershop in Kyiv, redesigning an Indian restaurant website, and designing web services and mobile applications for housing reservations and restaurant table bookings. I am enthusiastic about exploring new technologies and expanding my knowledge in the field.

I have 20 years of experience as a furniture and interior designer, along with client communication skills. I completed my training at "Alpaca - Tech & Digital School" and currently work as a freelancer. My skills include target audience research, sitemap creation, user mapping, UIKIT, wireframing, prototyping, and knowledge of hierarchy, color, and typography. I am seeking to join a team of professionals to further develop my skills and contribute to the team's success.

column2:
Projects Experience

- PetDetective – Webservice
A platform that helps owners of lost pets find them faster. Conducted competitor analysis, user interviews, and created a service with valuable information on finding lost animals.

- Cucina di Catharina – Website redesign
Redesigned the website for a traditional Italian gravy company. Implemented a new structure, added high-quality photos, and improved user experience with a CTA button.

- Mobile app PresentPerfect
Designed a mobile app for personalized gift-giving. Utilized Material Design System, conducted competitor analysis and user interviews, and created a detailed user flow with over 40 screens.

- Dashboard for IT school
Developed a dashboard for an IT school to display key metrics for students and teachers.

- Landing page Timeless Home
Created a welcoming landing page for a watch company, focusing on user experience and guiding visitors towards making a purchase or desired action.

Skills: Proficient in Figma and Adobe Photoshop, with experience in designing landings, websites, and mobile apps. Strong team player, problem solver, quick learner, and good communicator.

Objective: Seeking internship or job opportunities in UI/UX design to further develop my skills and contribute to creating intuitive user interfaces. Passionate about positive user experiences and dedicated to continuous learning and growth.

Trainee/Junior Project Manager | Qualified Interpreter

Trainee/Junior Project Manager with 1 year of experience in end-to-end delivery of commercial projects utilizing best Agile practices (Scrum and Lean).

Experienced interpreter with 2 years of interpretation work in military, IT, and humanitarian settings.

Successfully managed a team of 6 translators and technical consultants to deliver maintenance documentation projects for high-value equipment, resulting in significant lead time reduction and accurate instruction of technical content.

Possess strong communication skills with stakeholders at all levels, along with critical thinking, analytical, prioritization, and decision-making abilities in fast-paced and high-pressure environments.

column2:
Ukrainian Corporate Governance Academy (UCGA) MAR 2021 - NOV 2022
Position: Project Manager & CEO Assistant
- Tracking project progress and participating in daily meetings
- Planning scope and schedule for projects
- Organizing and managing meetings for current and new initiatives
- Assisting the team with ongoing tasks during projects
- Documenting resources required to achieve project objectives
- Conducting research for initiatives
- Optimizing and managing organizational spending
- Preparing meeting follow-ups and presentations
- Leading reporting to the board of directors on completed tasks
- Conducting retrospectives with the team
- Monitoring and maintaining long-term goals of the company

Dattalion (Volunteering) Data Collection Team Lead & Operations Manager
- Developing, implementing, and reviewing operational policies and procedures, as well as writing data collection guidelines
- Onboarding new data collection managers
- Monitoring compliance with internal regulations and overseeing data collection processes
- Formulating strategic and operational objectives and performing quality controls while monitoring KPIs
- Collaborating with partners, donors, co-founders, and other managers
- Participating in weekly meetings to understand project status and needs
- Leading, motivating, and supporting the team to maintain a positive environment
- Identifying and addressing project problems and opportunities
- Managing budget usage and conducting budget reviews, reporting cost plans to upper management
- Reviewing and approving all operational invoices, ensuring timely submission for payment

HCM International Ltd., Researcher & Analyst JAN 2019 - FEB 2022

column2:
SCIENTIFIC CHRONICLE  

June 2012 – Graduated from the State Flight Academy of Ukraine with a Bachelor's degree.  

December 2012 – Passed the ICAO English and Phraseology exam at the 4th level.  

December 2012 - June 2013 – Conducted research in Air Traffic Management focusing on "Patterns of activity of operators in the system of air navigation services in case of delays."  

July 2013 – Graduated from the Kirovograd Flight Academy of the National Aviation University of Ukraine with a Specialist degree (equivalent to a Master's degree).  

July 2015 – Passed the TOEFL iBT with a scaled score of 86 (Intermediate level).  

September 2015 – Enrolled in Beihang University of Aeronautics and Astronautics specializing in Navigation, Guides, and Control.  

May 2016 – Coauthored a conference paper with Zheng Shuai-Yong titled “An Initial Research on Ultra-Wideband and Inertial Measurement Unit Pose Estimation for Unmanned Aerial Vehicle.”  

December 2016 – Received a scholarship prize at Beihang University for outstanding behavior and participation in activities.  

January 2017 - Developed ideas including: Micro drone flights in urban areas in China, Altitude Control For Micro Small Drones Flying At The Low Altitudes Of The National Airspace, and Offline Local Maps Creation For Micro Drones for commercial use.  

June 2017 – Published a book “Introduction to Multicopter Design and Control” under Professor Quan Quan's supervision.  

October 2017 – Invited to an International Conference to present a paper on "Altitude Control For Micro Small Drones Flying In The Low Altitudes Of The National Airspace."  

November 2017 – Participated in the experiment project ‘Comparison of using 2D-scanning lasers to camera sensors for light UAV obstacle detection and avoidance.’  

January 2018 – Appointed as the Head of Education Department at Beihang University.  

March 2018 – Intern at TUS HOLDING Ltd.  

Languages: Ukrainian and Russian (native), English (Advanced - TOEFL 96, ICAO 4), Chinese (HSK3, ongoing studies), Spanish (pre-intermediate).  

ADDITIONAL SKILLS  

Operational systems: iOS, Windows, Linux; Computer programs: MS Office, Mac Office; Task operational programs: Mantis, Leader Task; Graphic editors: Photoshop, Corel; 3D printing applications: 3D Max, Cura, Meshmixer; Computer languages: HTML, SQL, Matlab, Python; Knowledge of file sharing and cloud systems; Knowledge of office equipment; Social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Wechat.

column2:
I'm a creative mind, agile, goal-oriented specialist with 3+ years of experience in social media marketing, video production, and creative project management.
Skilled in developing social media strategies for businesses and concepts for content calendars based on trends and a creative approach.
Able to manage and prioritize multiple projects in a fast-paced environment. Team player with strong relationship and time management skills.

Video production (freelance)
2021-2022
- Produced videos for 25+ businesses (restaurants, real estate, educational institutions, fashion, etc.), 50+ private events, and 10+ stock footage in collaboration with video operator.
- Script writing and concept development for videos.
- Provided market research, tracked trends, and boosted engagement via video on clients' social media platforms.
- Handled transparent communication with clients.
- Managed budget for projects.

Houston Pub
2020-2021
- Developed marketing strategy and branding in collaboration with a graphic designer.
- Produced marketing roadmap and managed a team of 4 (designers, photographer, video operator).
- Social media management.
- Communicated with target audience, grew Instagram audience, and boosted engagement.
- Managed budget.

column2:
Experience:

- Self-made business owner, managing a team of 7 employees for postal delivery services
- Volunteering during Russian war against Ukraine, including fundraising for the UA army, production of trench candles, providing aid for displaced people, sending postcards to global leaders, and utilizing social networks for international support
- Founder of 2 "Meest" postal-logistic departments in Netishyn and Slavuta
- Co-founder of "Eco-Farm" in Netishyn
- Leadership role during Ukraine's Presidential, Parliamentary, and local elections in Netishyn
- Organized charity project between Finland and Ukraine, providing 15 tons of medical equipment for individuals with limited abilities and hospitals

Education:

- Bachelor's degree in Environmental Engineering from Tampere University of Applied Sciences, Finland (2011-2015)
- Completed studies in Spatial Planning and Environmental Management at Dublin Institute of Technology, Ireland through an Erasmus exchange in 2013

Skills:

- Project management expertise
- Willingness to learn and develop in the IT field
- Open to relocation for opportunities

Location:

- Currently based in Netishyn with the ability to relocate to another city

January 2023 - Present

- Developed and executed creative social media campaigns resulting in a 30% increase in event registrations and participation
- Implemented a customer support system on social media, reducing response time to customer inquiries
- Created and curated engaging social media content
- Analyzed social media data to inform content and campaign decisions
- Managed social media campaigns and built relationships with influencers
- Monitored and moderated community conversations, addressing inquiries and concerns in a timely manner
- Stayed up-to-date with social media trends and best practices



Head Of Branch at a Bank
September 2015 - December 2022

- Proactively addressed and resolved customer issues resulting in a 90% customer satisfaction rate
- Improved retention of micro-business clients
- Organized the working flow of the branch to ensure operational efficiency
- Maintained compliance with legal and regulatory requirements
- Consulted with clients of micro-businesses, providing guidance and support

**Project Manager Expectations/Strengths:**

- Not heavily involved in programming or software development
- Strong leadership skills 
- Excellent analytical and strategic abilities
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills
- Organizational skills to manage multiple tasks and responsibilities

column2:
Experience:

- Engaged in the creation of a web site – online resource for law consulting:
    - Participated in the creation of the web site in cooperation with the team of developers.
    - Participated in design making of the web site.
    - Participated in the development of the logical structure of the web site performance.
    - Administered the clients of the resource.
    - Administered the cases which are worked out on the website.

- Pro Bono Lab Manager (within Ukrainian Access to Justice School of Practice):
    - Responsible for managing the Pro Bono Lab platform, including gathering requests from non-governmental organizations and finding legal support from socially responsible pro bono partners (law and audit business).

- Responsible for the creation of the Learning course for social initiatives and NGOs from law and audit business experts:
    - Researched the most interesting and desirable topics for social initiatives.
    - Engaged experts from law and audit firms.
    - Developed the course modules structure.
    - Developed test cases.
    - Participated in the filming process.
    - Administered the first run of students (30 participants).
    - Transformed the learning course materials into SCORM-package in order to place the learning course on the Learning Management System.

**Professional Experience**
Founder and CEO, IT Company (2013-2021)
- Successfully led my own IT company for 8 years with a team of up to 15 employees
- Managed teams of up to 3 working on various projects
- Oversaw a team of 1 manager, 5 full-time developers, and 1 product project
- Practiced and implemented Scrum and other agile methodologies 
- Utilized task tracking systems such as Asana, Trello, and GitHub
- Experienced in versioning systems like Git
- Worked with WebGL, three.js, babylon.js
- Proficient in PHP with 3 years of experience
- Skilled in project time and budget estimation
- Ability to lead and motivate teams, set goals, and develop plans collaboratively
- Proficient in leading Scrum meetings and coaching team members in Scrum practices
- Capable of searching for technical solutions in complex situations during project workflow

**Skills**
- Team leadership and motivation
- Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
- Task tracking systems (Asana, Trello, GitHub)
- Version control systems (Git)
- Programming languages: PHP, JavaScript
- Knowledge of WebGL, three.js, babylon.js
- Project estimation and planning
- Technical problem-solving

**Education**
- Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science (Year)
- Certification in Scrum Master (Year)

column4: PROJECT MANAGEMENT EXPERIENCE:Project - AProblem - develop a solution for an outsourcing IT company to measure and trade against the client's and development team's satisfaction KPIs in a timely manner.Solution – designed project health check dashboard based on the satisfaction score of key stakeholders.Scope of work:- determined the scope of the project;- devised “12 click flow” of project health check;- designed a project health check dashboard based on the satisfaction score of key stakeholders;- managed tasks of a team of 4 other members;- performed Product Owner role.Project - BProblem – organize the development of special issues and migration from Tilda for the top 3 news agencies.Solution – arranged migration to Ukrainian web constructor and developed the special issues flow.Scope of work:- developed surveys for stakeholders to identify the top 5 must-have features in a new web constructor;- analyzed 30+ web constructors;- integrated best practices into the flow of special issues design process;- reduced the time of special issues design process by 10% with the new flow;- managed tasks of a team of 5 other members.WORK EXPERIENCE:AAL LF “Pragnum”2019-Present- managed high-profile cases with multiple-level stakeholders;- oversaw 7+ cases simultaneously;- successfully closed a tax evasion case totaling 10 million UAH due to lack of corpus delicti;- represented a group of companies in a 2,000,000 USD dispute against the Deposit Guarantee Fund.AAL “PRAVOTA”April 2016 – January 2019- efficiently represented the client in a wealth tax (transport tax) dispute, saving the client 5,000 USD;- successfully overruled a 10,000 CHF fine in a dispute against the National Wrestling Association.

column2:
In my previous role as a Quality Manager at an Aviation Club, I revamped and rewrote operational manuals, ensuring compliance with industry standards and introducing streamlined processes. This led to improved safety measures and enhanced operational efficiency. 

I spearheaded a project in alternative medicine, offering innovative treatments for holistic wellness solutions. 

I organized three successful master classes in Ukrainian cuisine in Germany, showcasing culinary traditions and fostering intercultural connections. 

As a Quality Manager at an Aviation Club, I ensured compliance with safety standards and regulations, developed quality control processes, and conducted inspections and audits to improve operational efficiency and prioritize safety. 

I have a strong track record in Human Resources and Business Creation, successfully crafting business plans, obtaining licenses and permits, and implementing branding and marketing strategies. 

In my role as an Assistant in a Marketing Company, I conducted market research, analyzed consumer behavior, and implemented dynamic marketing strategies across digital platforms and physical events. 

My diverse experiences have equipped me with adaptable, resourceful, and detail-oriented skills that can be valuable in various roles. I am dedicated to delivering excellence in quality control, business growth, and marketing campaigns.

column2:
Worked as a customer excellence consultant in an international environment (embassy), I was responsible for negotiating, creating and implementing successful sales strategies, managing exams registration, and fostering strong relationships between teams. My role required effective communication with clients and I also worked on developing my skills in translating and proofreading. Additionally, I was tasked with creating and editing advertising materials for the company’s website and I successfully developed and implemented a Facebook chat-bot project in collaboration with the Marketing team. This project helped improve the customer journey and reduce the number of typical requests requiring manual resolution.

Currently seeking a position in a friendly and creative team where I can further develop my skills in Project Management, learn new tactics and tools, and establish a proactive relationship with clients to contribute to company growth.

Projects (IT / LEAN / Staff development / Supply)
1) Successfully proposed and implemented two IT projects: "Bill of materials process automatization" and "MRP in SAP", resulting in annual savings of $34K.
2) Introduced and executed three supply projects, including "ABC and XYZ methodology for inventory stocks analysis", "New supplier implementation", and "Implementation of a new glue using scheme", leading to annual savings of $163K.
3) Implemented three IT projects and seven process improvements, such as "SAP GUI Automation" and "Automation of data People cycle consolidation", resulting in optimization by 2 full-time equivalents.
4) Managed a students' probation scheme, achieving a success rate of 72.
5) Developed and delivered trainings to over 600 individuals.

Work Experience:
Seven years in the FMCG industry.
- Proficient in web development processes.
- Familiar with HTML/CSS/JS.
- Experienced in Project Management processes.
- Skilled in creating technical specifications and project documentation.
- Competent in risk-management and crisis-management.
- Proficient in people management and negotiating with suppliers and subcontractors for long-term partnerships.
- Experienced in budget and timing planning, implementing cost reduction strategies.
- Proficient in creating and overseeing business processes and documentation.
- Experienced in remote recruitment.
- Involved in supporting staff performance evaluations and personal development.
- Skilled in preparing client presentations and staff training materials.
- Experienced in business correspondence.

Languages: Proficient in Polish (Elementary level).

Looking for:
- Exciting and challenging projects.
- Opportunity to work in a multinational environment.
- Potential for personal and professional growth.
- Stability of a permanent position.
- Friendly work atmosphere.

column2:
Worley
Senior Project Engineer
03/2021-05/2022
Responsibilities:
• Managing project deliverables and interfaces to ensure the project is executed in a safe, efficient, cost effective and timely manner
• Project communications and identifying key issues requiring action/response
• Review and finalization of project procedures in consultation with key project personnel
• Responsible for ensuring the project team is contractually aware of their respective responsibilities, scopes of work and deliverables
• Responsible for liaising with the Cost Controller and Planner to provide a weekly analysis of project status

Achievements:
• Construction & Commissioning of New Laboratory systems (Public Address General Alarm, Access Control System, Close Circuit Television), fire alarm, firefighting, HVAC, power distribution
• 12 server cabinets installation in Data Centre for information replication
• Risk elimination replacing laboratory on safe area

UBOC
Project Engineering Lead
09/2020-03/2021
Responsibilities:
• Monitor the overall progress of engineering work from engineering contractors and address problems areas as they arise
• Management of engineering interfaces and transfer of information between the engineering contractors
• Oversight of quality of the engineering work from the contractor in accordance with international standards

Achievements:
• Establishment of engineering processes & procedures across departments: PSCM, Quality Team, Construction & Commissioning
• Development and integration of Engineering Execution Plan

British Petroleum
Project Lead
09/2009-06/2020
Responsibilities:
• Fulfil the requirements defined in Project Procedure and associated guides and templates
• Provide input to establish the region annual activity plan
• Manage budgets for Project & Modification expenditure based on assigned activity set
• Oversee the assigned contractor’s resources to deliver the assigned projects or activities
• Performance manage delivery by contractors by using global benchmark, metrics and KPIs
• Manage internal stakeholders and interfaces

Achievements:
• Achieved $750M revenue increasing efficiency of the plant
• Increased gas production
• Elimination of safety and business risks, production increase gaining $.2.5M per annum
• Delivery of various oil & gas production optimizations projects

Positions:
- Project Manager at IT HB (Link - http://www.it-hb.org) for 6 months
- IT Business Analyst at Promocore (Information Technology Business Analyst) (Link - http://promoco.re) for 4 months
- Network and System Administrator at Vinnitsіa National Technical University 
(Designed and developed a corporate network at Vinnitsіa National Technical University in the educational building of faculty of computer systems and optical engineering departments. Manual assembly of completed and settings. Used VLAN, WiFi, WPA2, ACL, WDS, CAP manager, Squid Server, Radius Server, Teamviewer Server, Local connections to computers with video surveillance systems.) link - vntu.edu.ua for 3 years and 5 months

Projects:
- ChiliPizza (Design, layout, domain purchased, DNS configured, filled with information, integrated JS site menu, 3D tour, embodies all customer needs. Without SEO and SMM.)
link - http://www.chilipizza.vn.ua
- Joht & Alex Transport Company -- in process (Website development, consulting, business analytics, branding, SEO, SMM)
link - http://www.ja-bus.com
- IROOM link - http://iroom.ua
- EcoCITIZENS (EcoCITIZEN - the project is to design and develop information systems for environmental monitoring using microcontrollers Arduino and site. In this project I developed ASP.NET web site using MVC, designed and used a database msSQL and developed a sketch for arduino web server.)
- Site of Department of Business Economics and Production Management VNTU link - epvm.vntu.edu.ua (Developed Front-End, Back-End and MySQL database for the project. Used last version of CMS WORDPRESS with custom theme. Configure web server and FTP server.)
- Development of the system management and optimization of solar collector (Developed system for managing solar collectors in automatic mode with the ability to connect to the system "Smart home heating.")
- Development of intelligent home heating system (optimize building heating systems with alternative energy sources)

Skills:

column2:
Multi-skilled individual with a background in project management, healthcare, education, and public relations. Possess strong communication and responsibility skills, demonstrated through working with diverse populations and resolving conflicts effectively. Experienced in teaching, time management, and creating engaging learning environments. Skilled in public relations, leadership, and team management, with a track record of organizing and speaking at mass events. Highly goal-oriented and quick learner with three higher educations and a continuous drive for self-improvement.

Education:
- IT Project Management Course at A-level Ukraine (2022): Successfully defended a project on e-commerce website development planning.
- IT Project Management Course at ITEA (2022): Completed homework on planning a mobile application project for the university.
- Kharkiv National Medical University: Assistant of Department of Internal Medicine №1 (2018-...): Responsible for teaching foreign students online in English, lesson planning, and e-course development.
- Master's Degree in Public Management and Administration.

Experience:
- Physician-Therapist at Kharkiv City Hospital №27 (2016-2018): Diagnosed and treated internal diseases, assisted in healthcare organization.
- Youth Council Head at Regional Healthcare Trade Union (2016-...): Implemented youth policies and organized various events.
- Head of Volunteering at Student Council of KNMU (2013-2016): Managed volunteer projects and implemented project management skills.
- Copywriter at Webline Promotion (2017-2019): Wrote medical articles in accordance with technical specifications.
- Copywriter, Editor, Head of Medical Department at JDI Studio (2020-2021): Managed communication and quality of work.
- Receptionist-Administrator at Children's Medical Center "Neboleika" (2013-2017): Managed expectations, appointments, schedules, and conflicts.

With a diverse background and a strong foundation in project management, I am eager to apply my skills and experience to excel as an IT project manager.

column2:
2019 - Business Developer of a network of coffee shops

Dynamic and skilled coffee shop manager with strong leadership and management abilities. Oversaw all operations of the coffee shop and served as a positive and motivating team leader. Managed and trained employees, handled financial transactions, and implemented successful marketing strategies. Successfully managed a fast-paced coffee shop in a high-traffic area of the city and expanded the network to three stores. Personally closed $1.2M in deals and increased annual revenues by 1500% from $80K to $1.2M in less than 11 months.

2021 - Project Manager at an engineering company

Utilized strategic vision to drive organizational goals and effectively implement strategies and tools. Demonstrated exceptional communication and interpersonal skills to convey thoughts, requirements, results, and expectations to team members and stakeholders. Facilitated the creation of a well-trained team equipped to handle risks and threats. Applied a systematic approach to problem-solving and utilized strong negotiation skills to secure significant deals. Managed a team to achieve a common goal and closed transactions totaling $12M in 10 months.

Currently pursuing studies in Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence (DWBI) at EPAM.

Achievements:
- Established a solid base of loyal customers, resulting in a passive income stream

Responsibilities:
- Development of a customer acquisition strategy
- Brand management
- Negotiation

Glaz Systems (2018 - 2021) - Business Development Manager

Achievements:
- Built department structure and streamlined processes
- Increased the number of loyal customers from 3 to 50
- Optimized the service delivery department's operations, resulting in improved NPS and service margin

Responsibilities:
- B2B sales (IT)
- Account-management
- Building processes
- Development of a partner network
- Writing a Software Requirements Specification for the development team, incorporating client's improvement requests for the service
- Team management - resolving conflicts within the team, task delegation, conducting meetings
- Organizing business trips, participation in industry exhibitions, forums, direct negotiations with representatives of large HORECA businesses
- Other administrative functions (payment control, documentation processing, report management)

BALANCУЙ TEAM (JUN 2023 - NOW)

My project is designed to assist trainees from various backgrounds in gaining work experience within a team.

Currently, there are 2 projects in progress:
1.DefendUAId: This platform aims to provide assistance to the Armed Forces of Ukraine by offering links to verified funds and Telegram channels that gather donations for support.
2.Balancyй: A comprehensive time management application that helps users manage their work-life-study balance. We are currently developing versions for iOS, Android, and the web.

column2:
Achievement oriented recent graduate with a background in small business management, European and American logistics. Completed a 2-year double-degree master's program in Lithuania and Belgium while working for a large-scale European logistics company for 6 months. Possesses strong intercultural communication skills from living and studying in 5 different countries. Currently seeking opportunities to utilize management and marketing skills in business development.

1. Transport Manager 
Hegelmann Transporte UAB, Kaunas (Transport and Logistics)
- Managed trucks' personnel
- Oversaw 25-30 trucks daily across Europe
- Developed solutions for unexpected issues
- Prepared initial documents
- Established customer contacts
- Negotiated delivery terms

2. Afterhours Freight Dispatcher 
General Freight Experts Inc., Ternopil (Transport and Logistics)
- Booked freights in the US
- Planned and monitored 4-6 assigned drivers
- Cultivated customer relationships
- Stayed informed on freight trends
- Verified freight brokers' credit ratings to minimize financial risks
- Negotiated and drafted commercial contracts for clients

3. Store Manager 
Buchach Coffee Store
- Communicated with suppliers
- Served coffee and related products
- Monitored service standards
- Maintained equipment
- Conducted staff training

Seeking a team-oriented workplace where mutual support and collaboration are valued.

column2:
Art Director with 5 years of extensive experience in working on various international movies, with an additional 1.5 years as Head of Creative Team in SE film production, a Ukraine-Israeli production company. Skilled at developing budgets, providing timeline specifications, and conducting reports on the progress of projects. Dedicated to finishing all projects within schedule. Offer strong attention to detail, deep passion for film and television, great communication skills, and significant ability to work in team environments.

- In charge of the Ukrainian part of PLAN A (Germany, Israel), a WWII drama starring August Diel and Sylvia Hocs, involving the building of destroyed streets of Nurnberg 1945.
- Played a key role in the reconstruction of Turkey in the 90s for the movie Check Out (Israel) starring Josh Peis, which was shot in Ukraine.
- Contributed to the historical musical Victory (Israel), which involved the reconstruction of Tel-Aviv in the 60s with various musical stages.
- Managed an international art department team for the production of Arugam Bay (Israel) shot in Sri Lanka.

Participated in the Female Leader Summit organized by the European Leadership Debate Academy for Eastern Europe countries, as well as completed courses in Agile project management, Project Management, Soft Skills, and HR management in 2021 and 2022.

column2:
Commercial Project Manager with over 15 years of experience in Contracts & Cost Control Management, materials & services supplying with practice to work in engineering projects:

I. ROSHEN 2021-2022
Confectionery Corporation
Position: Project Manager
EPCM Project Management, new construction of Sodium Hypochlorite production (Kyiv, Ukraine):
- Negotiating & drafting Contracts & Agreements
- Cost Control & Budget forecasting
- Financing & Monthly progress payments responsibilities
- Contractual issues, Planning and Reporting management

II. SIEMENS UKRAINE 2020-2021
Engineering Company
Position: Commercial Project Manager
Bidding process providing and contracts drafting
- Project performance reporting
- IFRS and Local revenue, costs, and sales margin recognition
- Signing of Acceptance Protocols, Invoices, and Currency Exchange Certificates
- Contractual issues and Risks management

III. NOSTRUM OIL & GAS
Project 1: Gas Treatment Unit 1&2 / 2009-2012
Project 2: Gas Treatment Unit 3 / 2012-2020
Position: Contracts & Cost Control Manager
- Contract Management in Supplying and Construction works, Subcontracting & Services Providing at EPCM Project
- Bidding process providing and Contracts awarding
- Negotiating & drafting FIDIC Contracts & Agreements
- Cash flow preparing & Budget planning
- Cost Control and Quantity surveying
- Estimation and releasing of Site Extra Work Orders
- Contractual correspondence and Claims responsibility

Ready to become a part of a multinational & multidiscipline project team with corporate values.
